snippet.title: Tropico 6 - The Llama of Wall Street DLC Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP2060-CUSA08217_00-DLC1000000000LOW

It’s time to play in the major league. El Presidente invades the world of international brands, big time. Power in politics is never enough for a man with great ambitions, such as El Prez. Join forces with the shad…err trustworthy broker and help Tropico to establish its status as a megabrand. Unravel the secret behind brokers sinister endgame master plan, as you try to sabotage the US financial world. In order to assert yourself on the market you will have to be a Llama among wolves…or something like that.

New gameplay mechanics await, as prices of goods now succumb to fluctuations and trends. Use new buildings like the Trade Institute to play the markets and manipulate export prices. The new Warehouse provides more options to micromanage logistics and enables you to stock your goods and sell them at later point for a bigger buck. Random events will now trigger and pose as an additional challenge. Additionally, you will find lots of new content such as traits, customization options and edicts.
